fycFilterDescription.localized: Refer a friend and benefit both from special savings per suite
Category upgrades, $1,000 shipboard credit per suite & 15% reduced deposit
Travelling alone? Our single supplements start at just 25%
Enjoy an additional 5% saving if you are a returning guest
Enjoy a game of Bridge aboard our special sailings
Taste the flavours of your region on our gastronomic cruises
On board to greet solo guests

description.localized: After an extensive refurbishment, Silver Cloud is the most comfortable expedition ship sailing today.
The name says it all. A stylish apartment. Prestigious and classic. For those who seek the superlative level of space, comfort and service on board.
Expertly designed and exquisitely appointed. The ideal space for both entertaining friends and enjoying quiet alone time.
Stately. Commanding and majestic. Perfect for entertaining. Enough living space to roam. The pinnacle of good living.
Stylish and sophisticated. Larger verandas. Perfection in design for comfortable living.
Teak style balcony with floor-to-ceiling glass doors. Relaxing living room space with sitting area.
The Deluxe Veranda Suite offers a comfortable living space, close to the heart of the ship.
A Silversea signature. Spacious and welcoming. Each spectacular sunset feels like it is yours alone.
A quiet sanctuary. Large picture windows frame panoramic ocean views. The perfect backdrop for breakfast in bed.
No cruise is complete without meeting new people. Enjoy complimentary drinks and live music at the bar while meeting other guests.

children.text: With complimentary cocktails and engaging conversation, live music and a dance floor, Dolce Vita on board Silver Cloud welcomes guests to mix and mingle. When living such unique experiences as these, there is never a dull moment!

description.localized: Maintain your fresh look throughout your luxury cruise at the Zagara Beauty Salon. Services are available for men and women.

children.text: A full range ofÂ Zagara Beauty Salon services is available for both men and women including hairstyling, manicures and pedicures. Appointments for these chargeable services may be made on board the ship.

description.localized: Chaise lounges arranged in the sun or shade. Bubbling whirlpools. The pool water refreshing in warmer climates, heated for cooler weather.

children.text: Chaise lounges arranged in the sun or shade. Bubbling whirlpools. The pool water refreshing in warmer climates, heated for cooler weather. The attentive staff at the ready with an oversized towel as you emerge from the pool, with your favourite beverage at just the right moment. This is expedition cruising as you have never experienced it before. What better way to watch the icebergs?

description.localized: Be sure to visit the Reception area, where our experts can provide invaluable information to help you get the most out of your cruise.

children.text: This central lobby area welcomes guests to speak with our receptionist should they have a question or require any service. Assistance is available 24 hours a day. The Cruise Consultant can also prove indispensable when planning your next Silversea voyage, or should you wish to extend your current voyage for a day, a week, a monthâ¦ Like having your own personal onboard Silversea professional, the Cruise Consultant will help you to select the perfect voyage, reserve your preferred suite and provide immediate confirmation.

description.localized: The Fitness Centre offers world-class equipment, classes, and personalized services.

children.text: The Fitness Centre on board this luxury cruise ship is equipped with free weights, weight machines, state-of-the-art treadmills, elliptical trainers and recumbent and upright bicycles. Classes in aerobics, yoga, Pilates and circuit training are led by the onboard fitness trainer and are always complimentary. Personal training, body composition analysis and specialty classes are available at an additional charge on board all luxury cruises.
Images are intended as a general reference. Features, materials, finishes and layout may be different than shown.

description.localized: If you appreciate good cognac or premium cigars, be sure to visit the Connoisseurâs Corner to see the shipâs exceptional selection.

children.text: The Connoisseurâs Corner offers exceptional cognacs along with a premium selection of cigars for purchase.

description.localized: The Observation lounge boasts exceptional views overlooking the ocean as it stretches out below you while you enjoy your cruise.

children.text: The ideal place for scenic days at sea, this vantage point far forward and high atop this luxury cruise ship is perfect for that âking of the worldâ feeling.

description.localized: There is a wealth of luxury shopping experiences aboard all Silversea ships, featuring the most distinctive and appealing brands from across the globe.

children.text: Exceptional shopping experiences do not end in the cosmopolitan cities we visit. Silverseaâs striking new shipboard boutiques, reimagined and redesigned are stunning modern design spaces befitting the finest creations from legendary designers. Carefully selected partners onboard Silverseaâs duty-free boutiques offers our guests a carefully curated selection of cutting edge fashions, jewelry, accessories, fine perfumes, cosmetics and Silversea Logo collection all at duty-free prices.

description.localized: Perfect for presentations, lectures and video screenings, this is where our team of dedicated experts share their knowledge on their specialised subject, not to mention their infectious passion and energy.

children.text: Perfect for presentations, lectures and video screenings, this is where our team of dedicated experts share their knowledge on their specialised subject, not to mention their infectious passion and energy. Multi-tiered Explorer Lounge and banquette style seating ensure that you enjoy every minute of the talk and with lectures being streamed live to your suite if desired, this is one of the very few lecture theatres at sea theatre to combine such comfort with such technology.

description.localized: Relax and unwind in the Panorama Lounge, a sophisticated yet amicable space offering beautiful ocean views as you enjoy your cruise.

children.text: The Panorama Lounge is specially designed to provide an uninterrupted view of the dayâs destination from the comfort of the luxury cruise shipâs interior. This is an ideal place to unwind on your cruise, enjoy afternoon tea, listen to the pianist and watch the setting sun. The drinks are complimentary, the music live and inviting. Enjoy dancing to a range of musical styles for every taste from standards to the latest club mixes.

description.localized: Come and indulge in a luxurious spa treatment. Facials, body wraps, massages: the spa is the perfect place to unwind.

children.text: Relax your body and mind in this luxury cruise shipâs soothing spa sanctuary. Indulge in a wide range of invigorating therapies including facials, body wraps and massages. Appointments for spa services may be made on board the ship, or in advance via My Voyage. Menâs and womenâs saunas and steam rooms are perfect for relaxing before your spa treatment or after your workout.

description.localized: The Photo Studio offers a professional space for budding photographers to retouch, print and display their work.

children.text: The Photo Studio offers a multitude of options to take your pictures from inside your camera to onto your walls. A vibrant, creatively inspiring space where you can not only master the art of digital photography with Masterclasses in editing, Adobe Lightroom and Photoshop, but also an editing suite where you can print images (including postcard, panorama and A2 prints). State-of-the-art equipment for both MAC and PC users, highly technological printers plus a dedicated photo manager to guide you through the many techniques to help you define yourself as a serious photographer. Even the smartphone photographer can become pro level with specialized training on how to use your camera phone its best possible advantage. Fees apply.

description.localized: Soft breezes and ocean views beckon at the Grill, especially as the sun goes down when cruise guests gather for cocktails at the outdoor bar and talk about the dayâs events.

children.text: One of the healthiest cuisines to exist, The Grill features lava stone cooking at its finest. Sourced from volcanic rock and placed in an oven to reach an optimum temperature of 400ËC, The Grill invites guests to cook their food directly at their table. Place your meat, fish or vegetables on top of the grill stone or inside the soup bowl, and then simply cook to your very own taste. Every bite is cooked to perfection, time after time. With the stone cooking available in the evenings only, The Grill becomes a daytime rotisserie and gourmet salad and burger bar, offering build your own burgers from the best selections of meat.
Dress code:
Casual
Casual wear consists of pants, blouses or casual dresses for women; open-neck shirts and slacks for men are appropriate.

description.localized: La Dame features a bespoke menu by our top chefs, and is the highest expression of excellence of French dining.

children.text: After a day of trekking through tundra and whale watching, indulge in an evening of palette pampering, where fine wines are complemented by a set bespoke menu of regionally-inspired dishes in an intimate, elegant setting. An extraordinary six-course experience celebrating the worldâs most distinguished wine regions complete what is surely the finest dining at sea.
Per guest reservation fee of US$60. Please visit My Silversea to make your reservations.

description.localized: Authentic Italian recipes and the freshest, sustainable ingredients come together in this restaurant at sea.

children.text: Offering the very best of Italian cuisine, La Terrazzaâs freshly made authentic a la carte dishes are complimented by a wide range of complimentary wines, even in the most remote of destinations! Using only the best seasonal produce, La Terrazza offers buffet restaurant for breakfast and lunch with indoor or al fresco seating and is transformed into an intimate Italian restaurant for dinner.

description.localized: Enjoy Continental and regional specialities, as well as sweeping ocean views in our main dining room.

children.text: Sparkling with tales of adventure, bonhomie and like-minded friends, The Restauant offers contemporary, international cuisine created by our most talented chefs. Menus feature regional specialities unique to the destinations guests visit on their cruise, so donât be surpised to see a roasted Chilean Sea Bass while cruising the Chilean fjords.
Silver Cloud

is the first hybrid ship in our fleet and brings the remote and remarkable to you in ultra-luxurious comfort. Her large suites, destination itineraries and unparalleled service make her truly special. Four dining options will tantalise your taste buds, and as 80% of her suites include a veranda, watching a breaching whale from the comfort of your balcony never been so personal. A limited number of guests in polar waters (240 vs. 254) and in the Kimberley (200 vs. 254), mean that
Silver Cloud
has one of the highest crew to guest and space to guest ratios in expedition cruising. With her 20 zodiacs, 10 kayaks, possibilities are almost limitless with ship-wide simultaneous explorations.

leadIn.localized: With 20-brand new Zodiacs, four superlative restaurants in Antarctica and a pole-to-pole expedition itinerary, Silver Cloud breaks the ice between expedition and luxury.

Silver Cloud
